int amp_raw_thread_join ( amp_thread_t  thread  ) 

Like amp_thread_join_and_destroy but does not free memory other than indirectly via the platform API to join with the thread.

void *  thread_func_context,

Like amp_thread_launch but does not allocate memory for the thread other than indirectly via the platform API to launch a thread.
